name: Danger Mondays
description:
Developed for Ludum Dare 37, thought I'd try out the Nape Physics Engine, what a terrible mistake to make during a 48 hour games jam.

Aim:

Try to stay on the porta-loo for as long as possible before you end up in a huge mess. Timing and balance is the key to staying on for as long as possible.

Controls (Keyboard):
R - Starts New Game
Left/Right - Lean inside portaloo.
